channel.title: Docs on JAlgoArena Home
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on JAlgoArena Home

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Deploy with Docker & Nomad To deploy JAlgoArena - you will need to spin up Nomad and Consul clusters plus install Docker Engine. Make sure Docker is available on your machines Install Consul and Nomad clusters use step0.sh to run locally on your laptop - it’s not recommended for production use case Install Consul Cluster Install Nomad Cluster Once you have Nomad and Consul up and running, you may start running JAlgoArena external services: Clone JAlgoArena-Nomad locally git clone https://github.

item.title: Calculating Points
item.description: Problem Difficulty Firstly, base amount of points depends on problem difficulty: Difficulty Base Points Easy 10 points Medium 30 points Hard 50 points Time Penalty Secondly, amount of points which depends on time penalty: Elapsed Time / Time Limit Points Factor >= 500 1.0 >= 100 3.0 >= 10 5.0 >= 1 8.
